title: Green Flash
alt: The exact cause of the phenomenon is unknown, but it's thought to be linked to atmospheric refraction and you getting a really cool car.
transcript:
[Black Hat and Cueball are standing on the beach, watching the sun set. Black Hat is holding something in his left hand.]
Black Hat: Did you know that if you stare at the sun just as it sets, you can see a green flash? 
Black Hat: And feel a sharp blow to the head, and hear the faint hum of me driving away in your new Tesla Roadster?
